unnormalised: Think beyond just watching movies. Film festivals are buzzing hubs of creativity, connection, and a whole lotta chai. From the glitz of the Jio MAMI Mumbai Film Festival to the indie vibe of the International Film Festival of Kerala (IFFK) in Thiruvananthapuram, there's a festival out there for every taste.
normalised: what is so special about them? well, first off, you get to see films you probably would not find at your local multiplex. we are talking independent cinema, documentaries that will blow your mind, and international films that offer a glimpse into different cultures. remember that tiny theatre showing 'Lagaan' before it became a national phenomenon? that is the kind of discovery you might stumble upon!
